name: bootstrap-icons
description: Official open source icon library for Bootstrap

scripts.icons-zip: cross-env-shell "shx rm -rf bootstrap-icons-$npm_package_version && shx cp -r icons/ bootstrap-icons-$npm_package_version && zip -r9 bootstrap-icons-$npm_package_version.zip bootstrap-icons-$npm_package_version && shx rm -rf bootstrap-icons-$npm_package_version"
scripts.push-pages: cd _site && git init && git remote add staging https://github.com/twbs/icons/ && git add . && git commit -m "Publishing latest changes" && git push staging master:gh-pages --force && git remote rm staging
scripts.publish: cross-env HUGO_ENV=production npm run docs-build && npm run push-pages

author: mdo
